articles.description: On Thursday, the 67-year-old showbusiness legend looked completely unrecognisable during rehearsals for her latest project, the stage musical Pippin, in which she has one of the leading roles
articles.content:
She's the showbusiness legend who was made redundant from Studio 10 earlier this year.
And on Thursday, Kerri-Anne Kennerley looked completely unrecognisable during rehearsals for her latest project… [+2712 chars]
